description: This is now my main notetaking app, synced with Nextcloud by just selecting the Notes folder of my nextcloud as the working folder of the App. Feels nice to use, is very fast!
summary: Pretty nice, integrates well with Nextcloud

description: i REALLY like it but i wished i could somehow add images and screenshots directly to it. idont think its possible but yea. thx for making this app

Very pretty and integrates very well with GNOME, and takes advantage of the GTK4's flexible UI features, while also being reasonably functional. Still missing some features and has some moderate bugs/crashes, but this is expected from such a new app. 

Very promising future, though I might recommend others to wait a couple months for greater stability.
simply perfect
It's simple enough to have you notes organized and you can keep'em synced with Nextcloud.
It's simply perfect
Does it's job. Probably the most beautiful GTK4 app I've seen yet.
Все прекрасно, но лично мне не хватает возможности экспорта блокнота и возможно его шифрования. Поэтому я собираюсь сделать форк этой великолепной программы
Very good program I like it but I lost my notes.When I created the second notebook what was in the first all disappeared.
summary: Good program but there are bugs

description:
This is such a beautiful and useful app for taking notes. I'd recommend it to anyone who's looking for a simple note taking app with standard markdown options. 

The app is light, responsive, fast, and just works. 

Huge thanks to the developer for their time and effort they've put into this app and for making it available for free. Keep up the great work!
I love this app! It's so nice to take notes and just use. Wish it would have more features like syncing and markdown support, but it's great overall!
The app I'm waiting for years! It's going to replace Typora as more core functions get implemented.
A simple and beautiful app. It is great that you have direct access to the markdown files.
simply put, that is a missing component for gnome 42.
summary: best-ever for gnome, it matches its simplicicity and elegance

description: It is the best note taking app I have ever seen, just I don't have enough words to explain it's greatness
summary: It does one thing, and does it perfectly

description: the ui is sick just need more updates and a little more fetures and just remove some bugs
summary: Love it , best for the ui

description: I read about this app on OMG! Ubuntu! today and am just floored by it. It's well-designed, smooth, adaptive, and makes great use of the light and dark style. I'm stoked to see it on Flathub and it will likely become my notetaking app of choice.
summary: Where did this come from? It's great!

description: I would love it if this supported synching with e.g. Google Keep notes.
really had high hopes after reading reviews but app crashing while opening wont even open after load
Exactly what I want in a simple note taking app, looks fenomenal (very apple-esque if you're into that). My only request is Vim-like navigation when editing text.
The program itself is very polished and easy to use, but it keeps crashing, making using it impossible.

+ intuitive design, a mixture of Google Keep and Apple Notes,
+ offline notes,
+ markdown support,
+ notes are searchable on Gnome,
- writing via "New Note" button forces you to name the new note first,
- no tables
When you create the very first note, "Create note" button remains untill the app is restarted.
I lost all my notes which I spent hours writing. I wouldn't recomment anyone to use this app.

The app is great, the hybrid WYSIWYG and Markdown style works extremeley well. Although, a couple features I would like to see:

1. Sub-notebooks
2. Support the stuff supported by pandoc-plot[1], it would be very useful. At least implement mermaid diagrams
3. LaTeX or KaTeX maths support.

[1]: https://github.com/LaurentRDC/pandoc-plot
summary: Love it, could use a couple more features

description: I really want to like this app because it looks very useful and nice, but it's crashing way too much.

Needs image management feature, more integration with
the web, etc. Hopefully, the developer is working on these missing functions.
summary: Nice looking interface; needs more features

description:
FONT SIZE ADJUST FEATURE IF INCLUDED THEN IT IS GREAT 

REPEATED UPDATES TO BUG FIX IS AWESOME?️
summary: FONT SIZE ADJUST IS REQUIRED IN PLAIN TEXT

description: mi olin e ilo ni. mi pali e ni la, mi pilin pona.
Very very nice.
I would give 4 stars just for the markdown being hidden by default, but I give it 5 because it has an increible Uı on top of that.

This is a simple note taking app with support for having different notebooks in different colors. I can organize my notes easily without wondering around any complicated menus. I would like to have an online backup solution with this app.
The interface is excellent and easy to get used to. The app is fast and the integrated search provider for GNOME really makes this great for when you need to rush with notes in class.
summary: Awesome, an excellent notetaking app for Linux!

description: Solo le agregaría previsualización de markdown y sería 5 estrellas. Por lo demás, excelente aplicación de notas con soporte para markdown y workspaces (llamados notebooks, en la aplicación). A 18/4/2022 aun no está traducida al español.
Me encanta que divida las notas en cuadernos, y además lo hace de una manera bonita. El editor en las notas es lo suficientemente bueno. Recomendada.
summary: Me encanta. Una aplicación sencilla que cumple su función

description:
Simple y eficaz, con un diseño que casa perfectamente con GNOME.

Solo le falta estar traducida al español para ser perfecta.

Dentro de todo es una buena aplicación, aunque tiene algunos detalles para retocar.

Pros:
- Markdown
- Manejo de libretas de una forma bien gráfica y sencilla
- Se puede cambiar la carpeta donde se guardan las notas

Contras:
- Los nombres de las notas no pueden tener puntos o comas. Me parece una restricción totalmente arbitraria.
- El uso de markdown está genial, pero debería automáticamente mostrar la previsualización y tener un modo de edición, sino es simplemente sintax highlighting y no es tan útil como podría ser.
- No permite borrar libretas, sólo notas. Para borrar las libretas hay que acceder a la carpeta donde se guarda todo y borrar la carpeta manualmente.
summary: Bastante buena, le faltan algunas features

description:
Fait bien son travail, intuitif, pas de bug, rien à dire... 
Et surtout, elle va super bien dans l'environnement gnome ?
summary: Pratique et jolie à la fois

description: То что всегда искал! Очень удобное приложение!
